FuncDef:
The static-user detect interval command configures the interval at which the device detects whether static users are online.
The undo static-user detect interval command restores the default configuration.
By default, the device detects whether static users are online at an interval of 3 minutes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an interval at which the device detects whether static users are online.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 60, in minutes.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To change the interval at which the device detects whether static users are online, run the static-user detect interval command.The static users in this scenario can be IPv4 static users who go online by sending ARP packets.
In the case of a large number of static users, set a larger interval to reduce the device burden. To trigger static users to go online, set a smaller interval.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
